src/newtonERP/viewers/secondStep/FieldViewer.java

00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;
00002 
00003 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00004 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldBool;
00005 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldCurrency;
00006 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldDateTime;
00007 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldDouble;
00008 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldText;
00010 
00016 public class FieldViewer
00017 {
00022         public static String getHtmlCode(Field<?> field)
00023         {
00024                 String html;
00025                 if (field instanceof FieldBool)
00026                         html = boolViewer(field);
00027                 else if (field instanceof FieldCurrency)
00028                         html = currencyViewer(field);
00029                 else if (field instanceof FieldDouble || field instanceof FieldInt)
00030                         html = numberViewer(field);
00031                 else if (field instanceof FieldDateTime)
00032                         html = dateTimeViewer(field);
00033                 else if (field instanceof FieldText)
00034                         html = textViewer(field);
00035                 else
00036                         html = otherViewer(field);
00037 
00038                 return html;
00039 
00040         }
00041 
00042         private static String currencyViewer(Field<?> field)
00043         {
00044                 String moneyFormatStyle = " style=\"width:80px;text-align:right\"";
00045                 String textFieldType = "";
00046 
00047                 if (field.isHidden())
00048                         textFieldType = "password";
00049                 else
00050                         textFieldType = "text";
00051 
00052                 if (field.isReadOnly())
00053                         return "<input type='hidden' name='" + field.getShortName()
00054                                         + "' value='" + field.getDataString()
00055                                         + "' class='textField' />" + field.getDataString();
00056 
00057                 return "<input" + moneyFormatStyle + " type='" + textFieldType
00058                                 + "' name='" + field.getShortName() + "' value='"
00059                                 + field.getDataString() + "' class='textField' />";
00060         }
00061 
00062         private static String textViewer(Field<?> field)
00063         {
00064                 String longText = "";
00065                 if (!((FieldText) field).isVeryLong())
00066                         longText = "textField";
00067                 else
00068                         longText = "textFieldLong";
00069 
00070                 return "<textarea class='" + longText + "' name='"
00071                                 + field.getShortName() + "'>" + field.getDataString()
00072                                 + "</textarea><div class=\"printableText\">"
00073                                 + field.getDataString().replace("\n", "<br />")
00074                                 + "</div></td></tr>";
00075         }
00076 
00077         private static String dateTimeViewer(Field<?> field)
00078         {
00079                 return otherViewer(field);
00080         }
00081 
00082         private static String numberViewer(Field<?> field)
00083         {
00084                 return otherViewer(field);
00085         }
00086 
00087         private static String boolViewer(Field<?> field)
00088         {
00089                 String html = "";
00090                 String yesIsChecked, noIsChecked;
00091 
00092                 if (field.getData() != null && (Boolean) field.getData())
00093                 {
00094                         yesIsChecked = " checked";
00095                         noIsChecked = "";
00096                 }
00097                 else
00098                 {
00099                         yesIsChecked = "";
00100                         noIsChecked = " checked=\"checked\"";
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 if (field.isHidden())
00104                 {
00105                         html += "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"" + field.getShortName()
00106                                         + "\" value=\"" + field.getData() + "\">";
00107                 }
00108                 else if (field.isReadOnly())
00109                 {
00110                         html += "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"" + field.getShortName()
00111                                         + "\" value=\"" + field.getData() + "\">"
00112                                         + field.getDataString();
00113                 }
00114                 else
00115                 {
00116                         html += "oui: <input type=\"radio\" name=\"" + field.getShortName()
00117                                         + "\" value=\"true\"" + yesIsChecked + " />";
00118                         html += " | non: <input type=\"radio\" name=\""
00119                                         + field.getShortName() + "\" value=\"false\"" + noIsChecked
00120                                         + " />";
00121                 }
00122 
00123                 return html;
00124         }
00125 
00126         private static String otherViewer(Field<?> field)
00127         {
00128                 String textFieldType = "";
00129                 String isReadOnly = "";
00130 
00131                 if (field.isHidden())
00132                         textFieldType = "password";
00133                 else
00134                         textFieldType = "text";
00135 
00136                 if (field.isReadOnly())
00137                         return "<input type='hidden' name='" + field.getShortName()
00138                                         + "' value='" + field.getDataString()
00139                                         + "' class='textField' />" + field.getDataString();
00140 
00141                 return "<input type='" + textFieldType + "' name='"
00142                                 + field.getShortName() + "' value='" + field.getDataString()
00143                                 + "' class='textField'" + isReadOnly + " />";
00144         }
00145 }
